graph_title: The share of the state conservation zone of the northern part of the Caspian Sea, lake ecosystems from the total share of specially protected natural areas (SPNA)
indicator_name: Coverage of protected areas in relation to marine areas
target_name: By 2020, conserve at least 10 per cent of coastal and marine areas, consistent with national and international law and based on the best available scientific information
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 293 KB)
indicator_available: The share of the state conservation zone of the northern part of the Caspian Sea, lake ecosystems from the total share of specially protected natural areas (SPNA)
indicator_definition: The indicator Coverage of protected areas in relation to marine areas shows temporal trends in the mean percentage of each important site for marine biodiversity (i.e., those that contribute significantly to the global persistence of biodiversity) that is covered by designated protected areas.
un_custodian_agency: UN Environment World Conservation Monitoring Centre (UNEP-WCMC) BirdLife International (BLI) International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN)
